    • Uses of TAPMetadata in tap.db

      Methods in tap.db that return TAPMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TAPMetadata DBConnection.getTAPSchema()
      Fetch the whole content of TAP_SCHEMA.
      TAPMetadata JDBCConnection.getTAPSchema()
      In this implementation, this function is first creating a virgin TAPMetadata object that will be filled progressively by calling the following functions:
      Methods in tap.db with parameters of type TAPMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void JDBCConnection.fillTAPSchema(TAPMetadata meta)
      Fill all the standard tables of TAP_SCHEMA (schemas, tables, columns, keys and key_columns).
      protected void JDBCConnection.loadSchemas(TAPTable tableDef, TAPMetadata metadata, java.sql.Statement stmt)
      Load into the given metadata all schemas listed in TAP_SCHEMA.schemas.
      protected java.util.List<TAPTable> JDBCConnection.loadTables(TAPTable tableDef, TAPMetadata metadata, java.sql.Statement stmt)
      Load into the corresponding metadata all tables listed in TAP_SCHEMA.tables.
      protected TAPTable[] JDBCConnection.mergeTAPSchemaDefs(TAPMetadata metadata)
      Merge the definition of TAP_SCHEMA tables given in parameter with the definition provided in the TAP standard.
      void DBConnection.setTAPSchema(TAPMetadata metadata)
      Empty and then fill all the TAP_SCHEMA tables with the given list of metadata.
      void JDBCConnection.setTAPSchema(TAPMetadata metadata)
      This function is just calling the following functions:

      Parse the XML TableSet stored in the specified file.

      Parse the XML TableSet stored in the given stream.
      Methods in tap.metadata with parameters of type TAPMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected TAPTable TableSetParser.searchTable(java.lang.String tableName, TAPMetadata meta, java.lang.String position)
      Search for the specified table in the given TAP metadata.

    • Uses of TAPMetadata in tap.resource

      Methods in tap.resource that return TAPMetadata 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TAPMetadata TAP.getTAPMetadata()
      Get the object managing all the metadata (information about the published columns and tables) of this TAP service.
